scripts.install: cd backend/ && bun install && cd ../frontend/ && bun install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend/ && bun run dev" "cd frontend/ && bun run dev"
scripts.commit: concurrently "cd backend/ && git add . && (git commit -m '$npm_config_message' || true) && git push" "cd frontend/ && git add . && (git commit -m '$npm_config_message' || true) && git push" && git add . && git commit -m '$npm_config_message' && git push
